pages:
Technical Assistance Report
 
Project Number: 31317  
December 1999 
 
 
 
Kingdom of Bhutan: Preparing the Basic Skills 
Development Project 
(Financed by the Japan Special Fund)

ASIAN DEVELOPMENT BANK
TAR:BHU 31317
TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
(Financed from the Japan Special Fund)
TO THE
KINGDOM OF BHUTAN
FOR PREPARING THE
BASIC SKILLS DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
December 1999

CURRENCY EQUIVALENTS
(as of 1 December 1999)
Currency Unit •   Bhutan Ngultrum (Nu)
Nu1.00 =   $0.0229
         $1.00 =   Nu43.48
The ngultrum is maintained at parity with the Indian rupee.
ABBREVIATIONS
BCCI - Bhutan Chamber of Commerce and Industry
MOHE - Ministry of Health and Education
MTI - Ministry of Trade and Industry
NGO - nongovernment organization
NTTA - National Technical Training Authority
RBP - Royal Bhutan Polytechnic
RTI - Royal Technical Institute
TA - technical assistance
TNA - training needs assessment
TVET - technical and vocational education and training
NOTES
(i) The fiscal year (FY) of the Government ends on 30 June.
(ii) In this report, "$" refers to US dollars.
